base64Encoding.title: Base64 Encoding
base64Encoding.description: Base64 encoding is a method of converting binary data into a text format to maintain data integrity while transmitting. Base64 encoding uses 64 characters (A-Z, a-z, 0-9, +, /) to encode binary data into text.

steps.1: Input data is first divided into 8-bit bytes.
steps.2: These bytes are then grouped into 6-bit blocks. Each 6-bit block is converted to a character in the Base64 character set.
steps.3: The resulting Base64 string is padded with '=' characters if necessary to make the length a multiple of 4.

base64Decoding.title: Base64 Decoding
base64Decoding.description: Base64 decoding is the process of converting a Base64-encoded string back into its original binary data to restore the original information.

steps.1: Remove '=' characters from the end of the Base64 string.
steps.2: Convert each Base64 character to its corresponding 6-bit value.
steps.3: Reconstruct the 8-bit bytes from these 6-bit values to restore the original binary data.

steps.1: Text Input: Enter the string you want to encode in Base64 or the Base64 string you want to decode in the text input area.
steps.2: Encode / Decode: Click the 'Encode to Base64' / 'Decode to String' button to encode the string into Base64 or decode the Base64 string.
steps.3: Check Results: The converted result will be displayed in the output area.
steps.4: Copy Result: Click the copy button next to the output area to copy the result to your clipboard.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: 'BMI Calculator' is a simple yet powerful tool that quickly calculates your Body Mass Index (BMI) based on your height and weight. This tool helps you understand your body composition and manage your health, track weight loss, monitor fitness goals, and maintain a healthy lifestyle.

overviewBmi.title: BMI Overview
overviewBmi.description: BMI (Body Mass Index) is a metric that evaluates whether an individual's weight falls within a healthy range based on their height and weight. Widely used globally, BMI provides a straightforward way to assess weight and health. The 'BMI Calculator' quickly computes BMI based on your height and weight.

calculation.title: How BMI is Calculated
calculation.description: BMI is calculated using the following formula: BMI = weight (kg) / (height (m) ^ 2). This formula helps assess whether an individual's weight falls within a healthy range.

steps.1: Enter Measurements: Input your height and weight in the provided fields. You can choose your preferred unit system (Metric / Imperial).
steps.2: Check Results: Click the 'Calculate BMI' button to see your BMI index and its classification.
steps.3: Optimize Health: Use the provided information to make health decisions, adjust your diet, exercise routine, and manage your well-being.

steps.1: Simplicity and Convenience: BMI is easy to calculate and requires only height and weight measurements.
steps.2: Utility in Large-Scale Studies: Effective for analyzing health issues at the population level.
steps.3: Relatively Accessible: A standardized metric that allows comparisons across different regions and ethnicities.

steps.1: Does Not Reflect Fat Distribution: BMI does not account for the distribution of body fat.
steps.2: Does Not Consider Age and Gender: BMI does not adjust for changes in body composition due to age or gender.
steps.3: Limited Health Assessment: BMI alone does not provide a complete assessment of health.

steps.1: Body Fat Percentage: Represents the proportion of fat in your body weight.
steps.2: Waist Circumference: Useful for assessing abdominal fat accumulation.
steps.3: Waist-to-Hip Ratio: Evaluates fat distribution across the waist and hips.
steps.4: Adjusted BMI with Muscle Mass: A method to adjust BMI by considering muscle mass.

rgbToHex.title: Convert RGB to Hex
rgbToHex.description: The process of converting RGB values into hexadecimal (Hex) color codes.

steps.1: Input three numbers representing RGB values in the range of 0 to 255.
steps.2: Convert each number to a hexadecimal value.
steps.3: Combine the three hexadecimal values to get the final Hex code.

hexToRgb.title: Convert Hex to RGB
hexToRgb.description: The process of converting a hexadecimal (Hex) color code into RGB values.

steps.1: Input a Hex code consisting of 6 characters (numbers and letters).
steps.2: Convert each pair of characters to a decimal value.
steps.3: Combine the three resulting numbers to get the final RGB value.
